revised_title: Plume Rise Estimates for Electric Generating Stations: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article discusses a comprehensive study on plume rise estimates for electric generating stations, focusing on the factors affecting plume rise and the methods used to measure and analyze the data. The study collected data from six generating plants with varying stack heights and operational conditions, and the results provide valuable information for understanding and estimating plume rise in different scenarios.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Air Pollution and Meteorological Dispersion
